author: noel
msg: Minor fixes: typo, CRLF line terminator, corrected calls to use the new getAttachmentType(Mail) method

author: noel
msg: New and improved Redirect hierarchy.  AbstractRedirect is the new base.  Redirect, Forward, and AbstractNotify extend AbstractRedirect.  Bounce, NotifySender and NotifyPostmaster extend AbstractNotify.

author: noel
msg: Check boundary case so that we can throw the semantic exception instead of an out of bounds

author: noel
msg: Improved performance when recipient matching is all or nothing.
